nodes.text: Necropolis was a giant crypt located on the artificial world of Iokath, accessed through the Tributary. It was the resting place for billions of Iokath creators, a species that wiped itself out during the Iokath civil war. In 3630 BBY, Vette and the Alliance Commander visited the Necropolis while looking for another exit from the Tributary.
Necropolis appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne "Chapter IV: Where Dreams Die" and "Chapter V: Ascension."
